title: Should You Be A Thought Leader?
description:
What does it take to become a true thought leader?

On this week's episode, we separate building thought leadership from building authority and show you how to decide if becoming a thought leader is the right direction for you.
author: jstark@jonathanstark.com (Jonathan Stark and Rochelle Moulton)
